timeline.message: Add java version 14
Support type test patterns
Make sure symbol table doesn't cry on duplicate name
Mark new API as experimental
Merge remote-tracking branch 'oowekyala/jdk14-pattern-matching' into jdk14
[java] version 14 is now the new default

[java] Make sure, SwitchExpressions with yield work with java14

Add additional tests for java14, so that we can later simply remove
the java13 preview tests

[java] Add support for TextBlocks in Java14

* New escape sequence "\s" added
* Added experimental ASTLiteral::getTextBlockContent to retrieve
  the text block with stripped indentation
Fix checkstyle
[java] Don't throw IllegalArgument if Literal is not a text block
[java] Fix new escape sequence "\s" detection

Update asm to 7.3.1

This add support for java 14 and java 15

timeline.bodyText: I think it would be nice to extract the rest of this routine into a static method. That way we can test on strings instead of having to parse a text block.
timeline.author: oowekyala

timeline.bodyText:
Does this work with CRLF delimited strings? It looks like it's not going past the LF. Maybe you just need to call this method on the normalized string, and stop caring about CR.
Also maybe it would be clearer to just return start + 1; here instead of breaking on the next iteration.
timeline.author: oowekyala

replies.bodyText: There was a problem with a corner case: If the content starts with LF, so that the literal looks like this: """<LF><LF>foo<LF>""", then we would have read passed the 2nd LF and missed that... I've fixed it.
replies.author: adangel

timeline.bodyText: I think this is missing \\ for a backslash
timeline.author: oowekyala

Record constructors are not allowed to throw exceptions.

Keep the tests and move them to java 14
except for the break expression

[doc] Update release notes: Java 14 Support

Fixes #2159
